description: LIMITED TIME OFFER: Download the game now, and receive an extra THOUSAND free chips!! *** Card Ace: Hold 'Em is the online multiplayer Texas Hold 'Em Poker game that Pre users have been waiting for! Compete against thousands of poker players online to rack up the biggest stack of chips. Play online any time, anywhere, against live human opponents. Card Ace makes it easy to play poker with your friends. Accept an invite with a single click to join a friend's game, or send them an invite to join yours. Want a quick fix? Jump into an online game in a heartbeat. Text chat and a unique picture based "emote" system let you communicate with friends and trash-talk your opponents while you build up your collections of hilarious Awards, and show 'em off to your friends online. Every day you play, you earn more free chips! Got Word Ace or Card Ace: Blackjack? Your Profile, Friend List, chips and XP all carry over between games! NOTE: If you are having trouble with the game, please email us! If you talk about a problem in a review, we have no way of getting in touch with you.  *** Don't forget to quit the app before updating!
